title: Testing Stat Hypotheses
description: Basic theories of testing statistical hypotheses, including a thorough treatment of testing in exponential class families.  A careful mathematical treatment of the primary techniques of hypothesis testing utilized by statisticians.

prerequisites: MATH 4262 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
